settings.title: Settings
settings.issue_describe: Please describe the problem so we can help you.
settings.issue_info: We will be attentive to your message and will do everything possible to help you as soon as possible.
settings.deactivate_account:
If you deactivate your account, you will not be able to access the app's features. However, your account and data will not be deleted.
You can reactivate it whenever you need to.

modal_hopper.travelChange: The trip details have been modified.
modal_hopper.newTravelAssigned: You have been assigned a new trip by {{name}}.

message.driverMessage:
Dear {{userName}},
Thank you for booking your ride with Hop!
Your driver, {{driverName}}, will be handling your trip. You can reach them at {{contactNumber}}.
For a smooth experience, complete your payment securely here:
{{paymentLink}}
Payments are processed through a 100% secure platform.
If you need any assistance, we're here to help! Contact us at soporte@hopmobilityapp.com.
Enjoy your ride!
message.reservationMessage: Thank you for booking your ride with Hop! Your driver, {{name}}, will be handling your trip on {{date}} in a {{carType}}. They will pick you up at {{fromAddress}} and take you to {{toAddress}}. If you need any assistance, we're here to help! Contact us at ðŸ“© soporte@hopmobilityapp.com. Enjoy your ride!
